name: Initial(J)D
description:
I was feeling some serious burnout after a couple long weeks of work and decided to make a game in a week to inspire myself.  I wanted to try making a car controller as well as some rather robust car ai.  I also wanted to make a game I could play and relax / vibe to music.  This is what I came up with.  Inspired by vaporwave, initial-D, and GTA vice city.  The game features 25 songs from a variety of genres to vibe to and really fun controls.  Sit back, enjoy the neon lights, take a long drive, and vibe to some music.  (Or you can switch the nos on, play running in the 90's and drift like a mad man)  

~Enjoy~

Controls:

WASD - Forward/Reverse/Turning

Left Shift - Anime NOS

Spacebar - Handbrake

Tab - Open/Close radio
